channel.title: Uid
channel.description:
Okay, the tut I did for the UID, I changed it back server side BACK to 0. But the one on my client I set to 16935248 alright. I know this is funny, but I shouldn't be able to connect since the UID's do not match, and it's declared. How do I get the UID to actually work, so only my client will work and no one elses?
~Client side, moving now. >.>

item.title: Uid

I know this is funny, but I shouldn’t be able to connect since the UID’s do not match, and it’s declared. How do I get the UID to actually work, so only my client will work and no one elses?
